About

I am an undergraduate student at Johns Hopkins University studying Chemistry and Applied Mathematics. My research interests are in computational and theoretical chemistry.

In my free time I enjoy swimming, biking, and running (in no particular order) and have been lucky enough to swim, bike, and run all while raising money for the Best Buddies Foundation. I also really enjoy coding in Python. Check out my Github!
